From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


This article needs a plot summary. Please add one in your own words. (January 2022) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)
2022 American filmHellblazersPromotional release posterDirected byJustin LeeWritten byJustin LeeProduced byDaemon HillinMelanie YoungJustin LeeStarringBruce DernBilly ZaneTony ToddAdrienne BarbeauMusic byChristopher CanoDistributed byTubiRelease date
January 21, 2022 (2022-01-21)
CountryUnited StatesLanguageEnglish
Hellblazers is a 2022 American action horror film directed by Justin Lee，and starring Bruce Dern, Billy Zane, Tony Todd and Adrienne Barbeau.[1][2]


Plot[edit]
This article needs a plot summary. Please add one in your own words. (May 2023) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)
Cast[edit]
Bruce Dern as Bill Unger
Billy Zane as Joshua
Tony Todd as Harry
Adrienne Barbeau as Georgia
John Kassir as Rick
Meg Foster as Mary
Courtney Gains as Bernard
Danielle Gross as Deanna
Crash Buist as Teddy
Ed Morrone as Joe Anderson
Paige Sturges as Liz
Production[edit]
Filming occurred in California and wrapped in February 2020.[3][4]

Release[edit]
The film was released on Tubi on January 21, 2022.[5]

References[edit]


^ Squires, John (4 February 2020). "Action-Horror Film 'Hellblazers' Heads Back to the '80s With Bruce Dern, Billy Zane and Tony Todd". Bloody Disgusting. Retrieved 13 March 2021.

^ Sprague, Mike (6 February 2020). "First Look: HELLBLAZERS With Bruce Dern, Adrienne Barbeau, & Tony Todd Wraps Filming". Dread Central. Retrieved 13 March 2021.

^ Grater, Tom (4 February 2020). "Bruce Dern Wraps Horror Pic 'Hellblazers'; Image Nation CEO To Lead Twofour54; Myriad Boards 'Fatima' – Global Briefs". Deadline Hollywood. Retrieved 13 March 2021.

^ Hamman, Cody (5 February 2020). "BRUCE DERN TAKES ON A DEMON WITH A CAST OF GENRE ICONS IN HELLBLAZERS". JoBlo.com. Retrieved 13 March 2021.

^ Squires, John (January 21, 2022). "Tony Todd, Adrienne Barbeau and Bruce Dern Star in Tubi Original Monster Movie 'Hellblazers' [Trailer]". Bloody Disgusting. Retrieved January 23, 2022.
